channel.title: Arizonascape- Great base v4 almost perfect
channel.description:
PLease try to keep this server bump if you want version 1.5 out will be better. Try not to flame.
V1.1 -------------------------------------------- BGS Removes Defence Levels. ZGS Freezes only. SGS(Is still perfect) AGS Hits 25% More. Added 4 different GW bosses to drop there own Hilt instead of 1 dropping them all. Fixed the Crystal bow glitch where the Bow GFX fires at the same time as the Pullback. Crystal bow is now 90% working(Still Uses Crystal Bow ammo) Chivarlys Chances of Getting rare Items has been reduced,You now only get Dragon Bones. Added Certain Items lower Certain NPC max hit(First one to Add This I think,and No ZDRs using the Anti dragon shield doesn't count because Im using 2 items for one ) Added NPC defence,Its in a config file. DarkBow would hit twice,But only show 1 Arrow,Fixed that,Darkbow is Now double Projectile(Sometimes This is still very Glitchy) Fixed the Whip special(It would show the GFX on you not the Player or NPC) Fixed Most bugs in The quests. Fixed The DFS bug where you had to spec to DFS special. Now its a random attack. Added More Items to Slayer,Also added black mask which gives a +3 Damage on Slayer npcs. It also gives +12 Strength on anything else. Updated the Chat On some portals,Also moved most some Portal Teleports around. Added Smite and Retribution,Now Im at 80% Prayer I think? Fixed the Retribution bug,if you die outside of wildy The damage you Inflict on players won't count. Richscapes clue scroll was short and sweet,Made a starter Base of making this Longer,+NPC to NPC. Fixed Agility up a bit. Added Skeletal Wyvererns that Drop a few good items,Like Granite Mauls,Legs,and shield. Fixed the Veng Does no Damage but still shows it doing damage,Now the Damage Adds up to your Hit.Ex:Taste Vengeace! 13 With veng +30 with A whip.You would now inflict 43 Damage. (This is still buggy) Had working follow,But have the time the other player would No-Clip Or follow a different Player A ton of Coords away,So I removed it. Removed the NPC Anti-Leech I added earlier. Fixed the DDS special in wildy,Now will hit twice(Sometimes hides the secound damage and says it did like 5 damage and really did a 20 20) Added Perfect Max hit. And theres a bit more,But I can't be bothered to list them all.
Bugs to Fix and things to add ------------------------------------------------ Using Arrows with Rune'Cbows Using Bolts and crystal bow ammo with Regular Bows,Or Dark bows. 100% Prayer,Already got the whole base down for it. Lunar Spell Book. Piety+Chivarly. Fix mage. Fix Combat. Fix the If you don't re-equip After a while your account gets nulled. And a few other things. If any other bugs you find please pm me and i will fix it as soon as possible
Now Back On Topic.... Picture 1:
[img]http://i34.tinypic.com/244wqhf.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i38.tinypic.com/2e2dx90.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i36.tinypic.com/2s8gwh5.jpg[/img]
90% Me since The follow TuT ended up A Hardcore fail. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- What V1.2 Has... 1-2 New Mini-games. Spread out the member system. Real Dark Bow special. Full Void Range+Void effects. Saradomin Sword. Dragon Arrows. Added More animations to weapons,So weapons hardly Take same equip as the other. 1 New quest. Need a Special Cape to Use vengeance. Fixed Skilling-Animations. Fixed Dharoks Effect. Added a White Vengeance skull. Re-Named portals to Be Perfect. Added 3-5 New NPC's and 2-4 New Objects. Fixed the Logged in logged in thing,It is now Logged in(If logged in) And logged out(If logged out). Fixed NPC chat but it still glitches at times. Added 1 New Shop,The crafting shop. Added Dragon Arrow GFX when fired. Tyras Guards,Metal Dragons and Khazard Men all Require Membership AKA Green Key Made Member things drop better items,Just for the members. Made Dark bow hit twice More often. And a bit more,But I know nobody likes reading this long.
[img]http://i37.tinypic.com/2l9iq0l.jpghttp://i35.tinypic.com/34r6nw7.jpghttp://i37.tinypic.com/30c6tcx.jpg[/img]
If you are a leecher,Then Go ahead and eat your leg. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- What I added in V1.3 Full Flax Picking,With Spinning wheel and working Seers tower. NPC's that can drain Stats.Ex:My K'ree Arra Drains Range. 1-3 More training Zones,Including Smokey Tunnels and Dark Dragon Lair. Chaos elemental Uses 3 different Attacks. Expanded Clue scrolls,You now do a few more steps. Need special Gear to fight Certain NPC's. Attack,Strength and HitPoints skill cape's Have there very own effect by using Charge. Added Dragon Battle axe with special. Added Dragon Two hander with special. Fixed Up Prayer Drain. 90% Prayer,Made all Defence,Strength and Attack Prayers do something. Made Saradomin Sword Special Hit Twice in Wild.(This is still Glitching for some reason) Added Void into Mage Mini-game. Expanded Kalphite Queen Lair,But didn't add new npc's Spread across Lair(Left this for you) Saradomin Sword double damage on players Is like Runescape,One max hit is 20 and Under,Then the Other can hit anything above. Fixed Combat up a little,added food timers and Skilling timers. Made Full Void effect a little bit stronger. Made The ranging NPC'S like the Monkey rangers show Arrows. Added NPC Agression. Fixed Guthans Effect. Removed a Useless Code to Reduce lag. Fixed DDS special,Its pretty Perfect Now. Added a few More NPC GFX. And a few More Updates.
[img]http://i33.tinypic.com/ossbwp.jpghttp://i37.tinypic.com/2wodidc.jpghttp://i36.tinypic.com/34pfcj6.jpg[/img]
=================================== What to Expect in V1.5. Full Lunar. Full Prayer with Lunar and Chivarly. Perfect combat with perfect timers and such. 8+ Quests. A better PK'ing System. Full Kalphite Lair. Atleast 40+ Jad rounds. ETC. But I will Only add these if I get Enough Positive Feedback. 100+ Posts in 2 weeks.
For now Here is the download link For all the versions except 1.5. I will only add 1.5 if i get positive Feedback and 100+ post in 2 weeks
Client Download *
Source Download *
